lead_paragraph: Alexander Vinokourov of Kazakhstan won the Spanish Vuelta yesterday, finishing 1 minute 12 seconds ahead of Alejandro Valverde of Spain. His overall time was 81 hours 23 minutes 7 seconds.
snippet: Alexander Vinokourov of Kazakhstan won the Spanish Vuelta yesterday, finishing 1 minute 12 seconds ahead of Alejandro Valverde of Spain. His overall time was 81 hours 23 minutes 7 seconds.
